naslov: Novogradnja!!! Luksuzna vila s bazenom uz more Vrsi (Video u prilogu) (prodaja)
opis: Pogled na more!!! VIDEO U PRILOGU!!! Prodaje se kuća sa bazenom u Vrsi - ma, predio Zukve, u mirnijem dijelu naselja, a u neposrednoj blizini mora i plaže. Kuća je izgrađena na zemljištu veličine 387 m2 te ima neto korisnu površinu 220 m2. Sastoji se od prizemlja i kata. Mogućnost izrade krovne terase. U prizemlju se nalazi ulazni dio, ostava, toalet, dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonom te natkrivena terasa. Unutarnjim stubištem se ide na kat gdje se nalaze tri spavaće sobe - svaka s vlastitom kupaonicom, a jedna od njih ima i garderobu i vlastitu terasu. Dvorište je skladno uređeno s bazenom kao središnjim dijelom, mnoštvom zelenila te parkingom za 3 automobila. Na zidnu ogradu će se dodat još antracit alu ograda i završi će se okolina (oko cijelog objekta). Kvalitetna novogradnja: - podovi obloženi kvalitetnom keramikom - podno grijanje provedeno po cijelom objektu - klima uređaji u svakoj spavaćoj sobi i dnevnom boravku za hlađenje i grijanje - aluminijska stolarija (Cortizo), komarnici - u izgradnji ograda oko cijelog objekta s prilazom za automobile - ugrađen vanjski video nadzor - grijani bazen - useljivo - uz kuću/parcelu moguć nakup/dokup više kvadrata terena (građevinskog) Sea View!!! VIDEO ATTACHED!!! For sale is a house with a pool in Vrsi, in the Zukve area, located in a quieter part of the settlement, and just a short distance from the sea and beach. The house is built on a plot of land measuring 387 m2 and has a net usable area of 220 m2. It consists of a ground floor and an upper floor, with the option to build a rooftop terrace. On the ground floor, there is an entrance area, storage room, toilet, living room with a kitchen and dining area, and a covered terrace. An internal staircase leads to the upper floor, where there are three bedrooms—each with its own bathroom. One of the bedrooms also features a walk-in closet and a private terrace. The yard is beautifully landscaped with a pool as the central feature, plenty of greenery, and parking space for 3 cars. An anthracite aluminum fence will be added to the wall fence, and the surrounding area will be finished (around the entire property). High-Quality New Construction: - Floors covered with high-quality ceramics - Underfloor heating installed throughout the property - Air conditioning units in every bedroom and the living room for both cooling and heating - Aluminum joinery (Cortizo), mosquito nets - A fence is being constructed around the entire property with access for cars - Installed outdoor video surveillance - Heated pool - Move-in ready - There is also the possibility of purchasing additional land (building plot) adjacent to the property. Za više informacija: Ivan Hosman Tel: +385 95 8717039 Email: hosman.nekretnine@gmail.com ID NEKRETNINE: 297-1
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
